com.daw.pms.Service.PMS

Interface UserService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserServiceImpl

    public interface UserService
    Service for handle all users' information in all music apps.
    Since:
    7/11/23
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Daw Loph

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • getUserInfo

        Result getUserInfo(Long id,
                   Integer platform)
        Return user information for specific platform.
        Parameters:
        id - Your user id in pms.
        platform - Which platform the user belongs to. 0 represents pms, 1 represents qq music, 2 represents netease cloud music, 3 represents bilibili.
        Returns:
        User information for specific platform.

      • checkIfPMSUserNameExist

        boolean checkIfPMSUserNameExist(String username,
                                Integer loginType)
        Check if the pms user with username already exists.
        Parameters:
        username - User name.
        loginType - Login type: 0 for email & password, 1 for GitHub, 2 for Google.
        Returns:
        True if the username already exists, false otherwise.

      • checkIfEmailAddressExist

        boolean checkIfEmailAddressExist(String email,
                                 Integer loginType)
        Check if the pms user binds this email already exists.
        Parameters:
        email - User email.
        loginType - Login type: 0 for email & password, 1 for GitHub, 2 for Google.
        Returns:
        True if the email has already been bound, false otherwise.

      • checkIfPhoneNumberExist

        boolean checkIfPhoneNumberExist(String phoneNumber,
                                Integer loginType)
        Check if the phone number exists.
        Parameters:
        phoneNumber - Phone number to bind.
        loginType - Login type: 0 for email & password, 1 for GitHub, 2 for Google.
        Returns:
        True if the phone number has already been bound, false otherwise.

      • updateThirdAppCredential

        Result updateThirdAppCredential(ThirdAppCredentialDTO credentialDTO,
                                Integer platform)
        Update the third party app's credential of current user.
        Parameters:
        credentialDTO - Credential dto.
        platform - 1 for qqmusic, 2 for ncm, 3 for bilibili.
        Returns:
        The result for updating credential.

      • updatePassword

        Result updatePassword(Long pmsUserId,
                      String newPassword)
        Update pms user's pass.
        Parameters:
        pmsUserId - The pms user's id.
        newPassword - New plain password without encoded.
        Returns:
        Common result.

      • updateEmail

        Result updateEmail(Long pmsUserId,
                   String email)
        Update pms user's email.
        Parameters:
        pmsUserId - The pms user's id.
        email - Email to bind or update.
        Returns:
        Common result.

      • updateBasicPMSUserInfo

        Result updateBasicPMSUserInfo(Long pmsUserId,
                              String name,
                              String email,
                              String avatar)
        Update basic pms user info.
        Parameters:
        pmsUserId - The pms user's id.
        name - New name of pms user.
        email - New email of pms user.
        avatar - New avatar of pms user.
        Returns:
        Common result.

      • addUser

        Result addUser(UserDTO userDTO)
        Add new pms user.
        Parameters:
        userDTO - User dto.
        Returns:
        Registered user's id in pms if success.

      • identifyUserByEmail

        boolean identifyUserByEmail(String email,
                            Integer loginType)
        Check if this email has already bound to user in this login type.
        Parameters:
        email - User's email.
        loginType - Login type: 0 for email & password, 1 for GitHub, 2 for Google.
        Returns:
        True if this email has already bound in this login type, false otherwise.

      • getUserIdByEmail

        Long getUserIdByEmail(String email,
                      Integer loginType)
        Get user id by email in specific login type.
        Parameters:
        email - User's email.
        loginType - Login type: 0 for email & password, 1 for GitHub, 2 for Google.
        Returns:
        User id.

      • getBasicPMSUserInfo

        Result getBasicPMSUserInfo(Long pmsUserId)
        Get basic pms user info.
        Parameters:
        pmsUserId - User id in pms.
        Returns:
        Basic pms user info.
